short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take screenshots inside the videos being played by the YouTube (Videos / Shorts)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever struggled with taking screenshots of the video you are watching for something important while using a screenshot tool on windows / linux or mac and it took you a couple of minutes to get a worthy screenshot? well worry not, use this extension and take screenshot of the video alone without any fuss. It's free without any limitations. Just install it and use it on any video of youtube (both shorts and normal videos) use email to request to add new sites. Thank you
